Title: Au pays des Juliets
Actors: Laure Duthilleul, Claire Nebout, Maria Schneider, Olivier Angèle
Plot: Raissa, Henriette and Theresa have completed several years of their long prison sentences. On their first 24 hours vacation the traffic employees are on strike. So the three meet and spend the time together. They talk about memories, their offences and fears. They become friends.
